title: User Login
iWantTo: be able to log in to the website
soThat: I can access my personal dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Given I am on the login page, when I enter valid credentials, then I should be redirected to my dashboard.

title: Profile Update
soThat: I can keep my personal information up to date
acceptanceCriteria: Given I am on the profile page, when I update my information and submit, then I should see a confirmation message.
hints: Ensure all fields have proper validation.

title: Story Submission
soThat: they can be reviewed and included in the backlog
acceptanceCriteria: Given I am on the submission page, when I fill out the story form and submit, then I should receive an email confirmation.
hints: Include a WYSIWYG editor for detailed story descriptions.
